item.title: WA-27 North/WA-27 West at WA-272 West
item.description: WA-27 North/WA-272 West at WA-272 west to Colfax. WA-27 continues north to Spokane.

item.title: WA-27 North Approaching WA-272 West
item.description: WA-27 North/WA-272 West approaching WA-272 west to Colfax.

item.title: WA-27 North - Palouse
item.description: WA-27 North/WA-272 West (unsigned) on Division St. in Palouse.

item.title: WA-272 West at WA-27
item.description: WA-272 west at WA-27 in Palouse. WA-272 joins WA-27 through Palouse. Use WA-27 South for Pullman. Use WA-27 North/WA-272 West for Colfax and Spokane.

item.title: WA-27 North Approaching WA-272 to US-95
item.description: WA-27 north approaching WA-272 to US-95 to Potlatch (Idaho). Normally US highway shields on big green signs in Washington are cutout and do not have the black box around the shield.

item.title: WA-272 West at WA-27
item.description: WA-272 west at WA-27. Use WA-27 south for Pullman. Use WA-27 North/WA-272 West for Colfax and Spokane. WA-272 joins WA-27 north through Palouse.

item.title: WA-272 West Approaching WA-27
item.description: WA-272 west approaching WA-27.

item.title: WA-27 South/WA-272 East Approaching WA-272
item.description: WA-27 South/WA-272 East approaching WA-272 east to US-95. US-95 is in Idaho.

item.title: WA-27 South approaching WA-272.
item.description: WA-27 south approaching WA-272 west to Colfax.

item.title: Entering Belmont Community
item.description: Entering Belmont Community on WA-27 south.

item.title: WA-27 South to Pullman
item.description: WA-27 South (1st St.) at Steptoe St. Turn left to continue on WA-27 south towards Pullman and Steptoe Butte State Park.

item.title: WA-27 South at WA-271
item.description: WA-27 South at WA-271. Use WA-271 North to Rosalia. Continue on WA-27 South to Oakesdale.

item.title: WA-27 South Approaching WA-271
item.description: WA-27 South Approaching WA-271 to Rosalia.

item.title: WA-272 East at WA-27
item.description: WA-272 east at WA-27. Use WA-27 north for Spokane. Use WA-27 South for WA-272 East/To US-95/Pullman.

item.title: WA-272 East Approaching WA-27
item.description: WA-272 east approaching WA-27 to Garfield and Pullman.

item.title: WA-27 North at WA-274
item.description: WA-27 north at WA-274 East to US-95.

item.title: WA-27 North - Tekoa
item.description: WA-27 north (S Ramsey St.) at Main St.

item.title: WA-27 North at WA-271 North
item.description: WA-27 north at WA-271 north to Rosalia and US-195.

item.title: WA-27 North Approaching WA-271
item.description: WA-27 north approaching WA-271 to Rosalia.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 289
item.description: I-90 west approaching Exit 289 - WA-27/Pines Road.

item.title: End WA-27 North At WA-290
item.description: WA-27 north approaching WA-290/Trent Ave. This is the northern end of WA-27. The southern end of WA-27 is in Pullman.

item.title: WA-27 North at I-90 West
item.description: WA-27 north at I-90 west freeway entrance.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 289 Offramp
item.description: I-90 east at Exit 289 offramp - WA-27/Pines Road. Turn right for WA-27 south to Opportunity.

item.title: I-90 East - Exit 289
item.description: I-90 east approaching Exit 289 - WA-27/Pines Road.

item.title: WA-270 East Approaching WA-27
item.description: WA-270 east approaching WA-27 to Palouse. The lights on the picture are snowflakes.

item.title: US-195 South At WA-27 North
item.description: US-195 south at WA-27 north. Turn right to continue on US-195 south towards Lewiston (Idaho).

item.title: US-195 South Approaching WA-27 North
item.description: US-195 south approaching WA-27.

item.title: US-195 South Approaching WA-27 North
item.description: US-195 south approaching WA-27 north to Pullman. WA-27 parallels US-195 north from here to Spokane.

item.title: US-195 South Approaching WA-27
item.description: US-195 south approaching WA-27. Use US-195 for Lewiston (Idaho) and Clarkston.

item.title: WA-27 South At WA-270 West
item.description: WA-27 south at WA-270 west to Colfax and Spokane.

item.title: WA-27 South at WA-270 West
item.description: WA-27 south approaching WA-270 west to Colfax and Spokane.

item.title: WA-27 South At WA-270 Junction
item.description: WA-27 south approaching WA-270. Use WA-27 south for Lewiston (Idaho). Use WA-270 east for Moscow (Idaho).

item.title: WA-27 North - Pullman
item.description: WA-27 north in Pullman.

item.title: WA-27 North/WA-270 East at WA-270 East
item.description: WA-27 north to Palouse at WA-270 west to US-195/Colfax/Spokane.
